slides.title: Welcome to Sankalp School
slides.subtitle: Empowering Children with Special Needs Since 1997
slides.description: A world where children with special needs and typically developing children recognize abilities, not disabilities, and learn together in high-quality, inclusive environments.

slides.title: Quality Special Education
slides.subtitle: Individualized Educational Plans for Every Child
slides.description: We create customized educational plans to meet the unique needs of each child, helping them achieve their maximum potential.

slides.title: Inclusive Learning Environment
slides.subtitle: Building Confidence and Independence
slides.description: Our supportive community encourages empathy, respect and acceptance in classrooms that integrate students with and without special needs.

highlights.title: Established 1997
highlights.description: The foundation of Sankalp, Kochi was laid in 1997 with a single room and a single child with special needs with the initiative of NWWA-SR (Naval Welfare and Wellness Association ‚Äì Southern Region). It was initially established as a day care centre only for Naval Wards. Now the School is open to larger community.

highlights.title: Own Premises Since 2011
highlights.description: Sankalp has its own beautiful school building located in Naval Base, Kochi. The school facility is housed in a modern infrastructure with latest amenities for supporting the unique needs of each child studying here.

highlights.title: Complete Facilities
highlights.description: Children with special needs are nurtured in a complete barrier free school building of Sankalp. Facilities include Sensory Pathway, Sensory Integration Room, Occupational Therapy Room, Physiotherapy Room and a barrier free playground.

highlights.title: Professional Care
highlights.description: Sankalp specializes in care for children with autism, developmental delays. Services also include Speech therapy, Occupational therapy, Behavioural therapy, Physiotherapy and Counselling to enhance Motor, Cognitive, and Social skills.

headmistressMessage.title: Headmistress Message
headmistressMessage.name: Mrs. Soma Chakrabarti
headmistressMessage.message: Every child has the right to avail equal opportunities as others, regardless of the difficulties they face. Special education is of great importance for children with learning disabilities, because it gives them the opportunity to get quality education in line with their unique needs. Special education enables every student to gain a high level of independence and reach their full potential. According to UNICEF, about 93 million children around the world have been diagnosed with some form of disability. Over 50% of that number do not attend school at all, which robs them of the right to a better life. In order to meet specific student needs an Individualized Educational Plan (IEP) is created for each child with learning disabilities. This way, the school designs an educational plan they need to implement based on the identified disability. The IEP is designed by a team comprising teachers, specialists (e.g. special education teachers) and family. The role of parents is crucial in this process, because they know their child best, and can provide a lot of valuable information.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To educate and train the children so as to enable them to achieve their maximum personal, social, emotional, and vocational adjustment and a rightful place in society.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: A world where children with special needs and typically developing children recognize abilities, not disabilities, and learn together in high-quality, inclusive environments.

items.title: Acceptance
items.description: Our school encourages empathy, respect and acceptance by providing classrooms that integrate students with and without special needs.

items.title: Community
items.description: Special Care is a family of staff, students, parents and supporters that welcomes one another with joy and love, providing each member of the community with hope and strength.

items.title: Customized Care
items.description: Our knowledgeable staff meets each child on their level and provides them with individualized lessons and customized care to help them succeed.

items.title: Peace of Mind
items.description: We are dedicated to providing every child with a safe learning environment and training of staff to be an open book with parents, offering constant communication and absolute honesty.

items.title: Inspiration
items.description: Our supporters ‚Äì from staff and parents to volunteers and donors ‚Äì are invested in building a better future in which each child succeeds and is recognized for their abilities, not disabilities.

feedback.title: Parent's Feedback
feedback.description: We value your feedback and are committed to providing the best possible education and support for our students. Please share your thoughts and suggestions with us so we can continue to improve our services.

items.title: Mrs. Kismati Devi
items.description: Sankalp school is a fine example of an institution which strives to remove the stigma of being called a ‚ÄòSpecial Child‚Äô. Each ward is treated as a unique individual with dignity, focusing on grooming and enhancing the hidden talents in them. I appreciate Sankalp for boosting my daughter‚Äôs confidence and growth through a sustained customized curriculum over the years. I also want to express that the well-maintained infrastructure, supportive staff and excellent transportive service have made our experience with the school very positive.

items.title: Mr. Pathak Raj Kamal
items.description: The teachers of Sankalp are very supportive and caring. Parents are also highly appreciated by giving them opportunity to take part in different programs of the school. The medical camps organised in the school in regular intervals really helped the children to get a better health benefit.

items.title: Mrs. Anureet
items.description: We had enrolled our child in Sankalp since last year and it has been a fruitful year for us. He has started walking and had become more interactive with people around him. It is a wonderful place with all necessary equipment‚Äôs which help children with physical and intellectual delays to achieve the desired goal. Under abled guidance of the staff, we are hopeful that our child will achieve more.

items.title: Mr. Ajay Kumar
items.description: Sankalp plays a vital role in shaping the lives of children with special needs and support their families with compassionate experience and dedicated caring staff. Sankalp also provides guidance and supportive environment for children by offering them a sense of belonging. Various therapies and innovative adaptive learning procedures practiced at the school empower children to reach their highest potential.

history.title: Our History
history.content: Sankalp is the name given to schools for special children of Naval personnel which is an amazing initiative of Naval welfare and wellness association (NWWA). The school is set up at four locations in the country viz. Delhi, Mumbai, Kochi and Vishakapatnam. Sankalp, Kochi was Established in 1997 with a single child and a single classroom at NWWA office. Thereafter, the school gets its own premises in 2011 and is currently situated in the Naval base at Southern Naval command. The infrastructure at the school consists of a classroom, physiotherapy room and operational therapy room. The existing sensory park at the school is a thoughtfully designed space aimed at supporting the sensory development of children with special needs. This park features various elements like texture surface, which is tailored to engage the children‚Äôs sense of touch hearing insight these spaces provide a safe environment, where children can practice emotional regulation and sensory processing.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.content: We believe that every child has the right to avail equal opportunities as others, regardless of the difficulties they face. Special education is of great importance for children with learning disabilities, because it gives them the opportunity to get quality education in line with their unique needs. Special education enables every student to gain a high level of independence and reach their full potential.

objectives.title: Objectives of the School
items: To develop Life skills, cleanliness and personal hygiene
To achieve social adjustment through group experiences and activities
To develop motor coordination through therapy
To evolve positive attitude towards learning

parentAssociation.title: Parents Students Association
parentAssociation.description: The Parents Students Association plays a vital role in fostering collaboration between families and the school administration.

details.title: Admission Period
details.description: Every academic year, the admission starts from 1st April

details.title: Monthly Fee
details.description: Rs. 3,000/- per child per month, including tuition fee and other charges

details.title: Admission Status
details.description: Admission remains open for the whole year

specialCurriculum.title: Special Curriculum
specialCurriculum.subtitle: Individualized Education Programs
specialCurriculum.description: Special curriculum activities extend beyond the confines of traditional training system. It plays a vital role in shaping our children. These activities provide invaluable opportunities for personal growth and skill development which help in the enrichment of the learning skills of our children. Special curriculum activities encompass a wide range of pursuits which gives a chance to our children to explore their interest and talent in various activities.

programs.title: Special Education
programs.description: Individualized educational programs designed to meet the unique learning needs of each child with special requirements

programs.title: Occupational Therapy
programs.description: Specialized therapy to develop fine motor skills, sensory integration, and daily living activities

programs.title: Physiotherapy
programs.description: Physical therapy programs to improve gross motor skills, mobility, and physical development

programs.title: Musical Therapy
programs.description: Therapeutic use of music to improve communication, social skills, and emotional well-being

programs.title: Vocational Training
programs.description: Life skills and job readiness training to prepare students for independent living and employment

studentCorner.title: Student Corner
studentCorner.subtitle: Each one of us is a creation of God, blessed with many unique talents, and worthy of success in all that we hope to achieve. As a community we thrive and flourish when we lean on each other, be the cheerleaders for achieving greater heights as a team. At Sankalp, we conduct regular activities for our wards to shine and showcase their talents. We often get pleasantly surprised by some new hidden talent surfacing during these events!

directions.title: How to Reach Us
directions.description: Sankalp School is located in Naval Base, Willingdon Island, Kochi, Kerala. The school is easily accessible and situated within the naval base premises.
landmarks: Accessible by road and water transport
